pages.title: IRIS Documentation
pages.description: Interactive Reasoning Intelligence System – Architektur, Setup und Konzepte
pages.content: IRIS Interactive Reasoning Intelligence System. Setup, Installation, Konfiguration und erste Schritte. Artifacts, Architektur, Module und Datenflüsse. Screenshots, UI, Prozesse und Beispiele.

pages.title: Setup Guide
pages.description: Complete Installation Guide for I.R.I.S. - Intelligent Rendering & Image Synthesis
pages.content: System Requirements: GPU VRAM RAM Storage. Minimum GTX 1650 4GB VRAM. Recommended RTX 3060 12GB VRAM. Prerequisites Python 3.9-3.11 Git CUDA. Installation git clone pip install requirements. Configuration Web UI no configuration needed. First Run python src/start.py web. Troubleshooting CUDA not recognized Out of Memory smaller resolution.

pages.title: Artifact Gallery
pages.description: Common AI artifacts and how to deal with them
pages.content: Artifacts are visual errors caused by conflicting data resolution limits prompt ambiguity. Clone Saga: two or more heads merged faces. Hand Horror: 6+ fingers backwards thumbs. Almost-Words: text errors like ČÅFĒ instead of CAFE. Anatomical Mysteries: extra limbs twisted joints. Cursed Generation: abstract chaos from conflicting styles. Prevention: Start small 512x512 upscale. Strong negatives. Simple prompts. Test different seeds. CFG sweet spot 8-12.

pages.title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions
pages.description: Answers to common questions about IRIS
pages.content: What is IRIS? GPU requirements. CPU only mode. Installation time. Model download. Prompt writing. Generation time. Multiple images batch. Save location. Custom models. LoRA support. Negative prompts. CFG scale. Sampling steps. Resolution limits. VRAM optimization. API access. Commercial use. Update frequency.

pages.title: Usage Guide
pages.description: Detailed guide on using IRIS for image generation
pages.content: Basic Usage: Launch web interface. Write prompts. Adjust parameters. Generate images. Advanced Features: Img2Img transformation. Inpainting selective editing. ControlNet pose guidance. LoRA custom styles. Parameters Explained: CFG Scale guidance strength. Steps quality iterations. Sampler algorithm choice. Resolution image size. Seed reproducibility. Best Practices: Start with simple prompts. Use descriptive language. Experiment with parameters. Save good seeds. Organize outputs.

pages.title: Prompt Engineering Guide
pages.description: Master the art of writing effective prompts
pages.content: Prompt Structure: Subject description first. Style and quality tags. Lighting and composition. Technical details. Effective Prompts: Be specific and descriptive. Use quality modifiers. Include style references. Add negative prompts. Quality Tags: masterpiece best quality highly detailed photorealistic 4k 8k. Style Tags: digital art oil painting anime realistic concept art. Negative Prompts: low quality worst quality blurry distorted ugly deformed. Examples: Portrait photography cyberpunk landscape fantasy character. Common Mistakes: Too vague or generic. Conflicting styles. Missing negative prompts. Overly complex.

pages.title: Troubleshooting Guide
pages.description: Solutions to common problems and errors
pages.content: Common Issues and Solutions. CUDA Not Detected: Reinstall PyTorch with matching CUDA version. Check NVIDIA drivers. Verify GPU compatibility. Out of Memory Errors: Reduce image resolution. Lower batch size. Enable DRAM extension. Close other applications. Slow Generation: Update GPU drivers. Check background processes. Optimize system settings. Poor Image Quality: Adjust CFG scale 8-12. Increase sampling steps. Improve prompt quality. Add negative prompts. Installation Errors: Check Python version 3.9-3.11. Run as administrator. Clear pip cache. Verify internet connection. Server Won't Start: Check port availability. Disable firewall temporarily. Verify file permissions. Reinstall dependencies. Model Loading Failed: Re-download models. Check storage space. Verify file integrity. Check file paths.

pages.title: API Reference
pages.content: REST API Endpoints. POST /generate: Generate images from text prompts. POST /img2img: Transform existing images. POST /inpaint: Selective image editing. GET /models: List available models. GET /status: Check server status. WebSocket Events: generation_start generation_progress generation_complete error. Authentication: API key required for external access. Rate Limits: Default 100 requests per hour. Parameters: All generation parameters supported. Response Format: JSON with image URLs or base64. Error Handling: Standard HTTP status codes. Integration Examples: Python JavaScript cURL.
